title: Message from the Principal
content: At Daly College, our goal is to nurture confident, compassionate, and future-ready young individuals. We believe in fostering curiosity, creativity, and character through a holistic educational approach. Students are encouraged to think critically, communicate effectively, collaborate with peers, and uphold strong values. Daly College continues to honor its legacy while embracing innovation for a rapidly evolving world.

title: School Vision
content: To be a leading school in India that prepares students to become global citizens with strong values, academic strength, leadership skills, and sensitivity toward society and the environment. We aim to equip students with 21st-century competencies, ethical foundations, and a lifelong love for learning.

title: School Mission
content: The Daly College strives to provide a balanced blend of academics, sports, co-curricular activities, leadership, and responsible citizenship. Our mission includes nurturing integrity, empathy, discipline, and independent thinking. We empower students with essential skills to succeed in higher education and in a diverse, global society.

title: School Motto
content: "Gyanamev Shakti" – Knowledge is Power. This motto reflects the school's commitment to academic excellence, intellectual development, and the belief that true empowerment comes from learning, wisdom, and the pursuit of truth.

title: History of Daly College
content: Daly College is one of India's oldest schools, rooted in tradition and excellence. It began under the guidance of British officers and Indian princely states, growing into a renowned institution that combines heritage with modern education. Its architecture, legacy buildings, royal associations, and long-standing traditions reflect the institution's remarkable evolution over the decades.

title: Evolution of Daly College
content: Over the years, The Daly College has evolved from a small establishment serving royal families to a premier co-educational institution offering day and boarding facilities. With the introduction of new academic programs, modern infrastructure, international exchanges, advanced sports facilities, and a strong emphasis on holistic development, the school continues to innovate while preserving its historical essence.

title: Heritage and Legacy
content: The Daly College proudly stands for royal elegance, historical relevance, and academic prestige. Its distinguished alumni, ceremonial traditions, heritage buildings, and long-standing relationship with princely states make it a symbol of pride. The school’s ethos blends tradition with modernity, preparing students for a global society without losing sight of Indian values.

title: Internationalism and Global Exposure
content: Daly College strongly promotes global awareness, multicultural learning, and a spirit of internationalism. Students participate in cultural exchanges, international competitions, global conferences, and collaborative projects. This exposure helps them develop empathy, cross-cultural understanding, adaptability, and a global mindset.

title: AFS Intercultural Programme
content: The AFS programme at Daly College encourages intercultural learning by providing students opportunities to travel abroad, stay with host families, attend partner schools, and engage in global cultural immersion. AFS fosters independence, communication skills, adaptability, and international friendships while strengthening students’ understanding of global citizenship.

title: Benefits of AFS Participation
content: AFS helps students develop maturity, global exposure, cross-cultural communication, leadership, and social skills. Through AFS, students learn to appreciate diversity, respect different cultures, and engage meaningfully with peers across the world.

title: Role of Daly College in Promoting AFS
content: Daly College actively encourages students to participate in AFS programmes as a way to enhance global thinking and personal growth. The school hosts international delegates, arranges cultural events, and provides platforms for students to share their international experiences with peers.

title: Global Initiatives at Daly College
content: The school regularly engages in global collaboration through Model United Nations, international conferences, debate forums, online joint learning sessions, global student summits, and cross-border classroom activities. These initiatives help students develop confidence, perspective, and leadership.

title: Cultural Exchange Programmes
content: Cultural exchanges allow students to understand traditions, festivals, values, and lifestyles from around the world. Daly College hosts and sends student delegations for immersive cultural learning, strengthening international bonds.

title: Values and Character Development
content: Daly College places high emphasis on integrity, respect, empathy, discipline, and responsibility. Students learn to uphold ethics in decision-making, participate in community service, engage in teamwork, and develop resilience through various life skills programmes.

title: Student Leadership Framework
content: The school nurtures leadership through prefectships, house captaincies, event coordination, team-based activities, student-led initiatives, and representation in various school councils. Students are encouraged to lead with responsibility, confidence, and empathy.

title: House System Overview
content: The Daly College House System is central to student life, promoting teamwork, leadership, discipline, and camaraderie. Students are assigned to houses upon admission and remain members throughout their school journey. Houses compete in sports, academics, cultural activities, arts, leadership events, and discipline points to earn the annual House Trophy.

title: Boys’ Houses
content:
The Boys’ House System includes iconic houses inspired by India’s royal and cultural heritage. Each house promotes excellence, unity, sportsmanship, and healthy competition. The boys’ houses include:

• Gwalior House – Symbolizes courage and honour.
• Indore House – Embodies leadership and responsibility.
• Bharatpur House – Represents resilience and service.
• Jodhpur House – Known for discipline, teamwork, and integrity.
• Jaipur House – Associated with tradition, strength, and excellence.
• Jammu & Kashmir House – Reflects harmony, peace, and unity.

title: Girls’ Houses
content:
The Girls’ House System instills empowerment, creativity, and leadership. Each house provides an environment for collaboration, responsibility, and confidence-building. The girls’ houses include:

• Scindia House – Grace, leadership, and academic strength.
• Daly House – Empathy, resilience, and compassion.
• Tagore House – Creativity, artistic talent, and wisdom.
• Rani Laxmi Bai House – Courage, determination, and self-confidence.

title: House Competitions and Events
content:
Throughout the year, students participate in house-based competitions, including:

• Inter-house sports tournaments
• Athletics and track events
• Cultural activities (dance, music, drama)
• Art competitions
• Debates, declamation, and elocution
• Quiz contests
• Literary events
• Community service activities

These inter-house events strengthen teamwork, leadership, and a sense of belonging.

title: Pastoral Care at Daly College
content: Pastoral care forms the foundation of emotional and social wellbeing at Daly College. Students receive support from tutors, counsellors, housemasters, housemistresses, wardens, and trained staff. The pastoral care system ensures safety, guidance, empathy, and personal development.

title: Hostels and Boarding Life
content:
Daly College provides secure, structured, and nurturing boarding houses for boys and girls. Each hostel includes dormitories, study rooms, recreation areas, dining facilities, and supervised living.

Boarding teaches:
• Independence
• Responsibility
• Time management
• Social skills
• Team spirit
• Cultural awareness

title: Boarding Facilities
content: Boarding facilities include furnished dormitories, study desks, common lounges, secure premises, laundry services, medical assistance, and nutritious meals. Wardens and matrons supervise daily routines, support emotional needs, and maintain discipline.

title: Counselling and Wellness Centre
content:
Daly College offers professional counselling for emotional wellbeing, stress management, academic concerns, and personal development. Wellness initiatives include:
• Mental health workshops
• Peer bonding activities
• Anti-bullying campaigns
• Career guidance
• University counselling

The system ensures that every student feels supported and empowered.

title: Co-curricular and Extra-curricular Activities
content:
Daly College offers extensive co-curricular opportunities to foster creativity, confidence, discipline, and holistic growth. Activities include:
• Music
• Dance
• Theatre
• Arts & craft
• Debating
• MUN
• Robotics
• Coding & technology
• Photography
• Creative writing
• Public speaking

title: Clubs and Societies
content:
The school provides numerous clubs for students to explore their interests and develop leadership skills. Popular clubs include:
• Literary Club
• Environment Club
• Science Club
• Robotics Club
• Heritage Club
• Mathematics Club
• Art Society
• Music & Dance Clubs
• Drama Society
• Photography Club
• Coding Club
• Debate & MUN Society
• Social Service League

title: Cultural Life at Daly College
content:
Cultural activities strengthen creativity and confidence. Students participate in:
• Annual Day performances
• Founder's Day celebrations
• Art exhibitions
• Music concerts
• Dance festivals
• School plays and theatre productions

Cultural life connects students with tradition, creativity, and expression.

title: Student Life at Daly College
content: Student life at Daly College is a blend of academic excellence, sports, cultural activities, leadership opportunities, and community bonding. The school encourages students to grow through experiences, teamwork, challenges, and celebrations.

title: Daily Routine
content:
A typical Daly College day includes:
• Morning assembly
• Academic classes
• Lunch break
• Afternoon sessions
• Sports & games
• Clubs and co-curriculars
• Prep time for boarders

The routine ensures discipline, balance, and holistic development.

title: Discipline and Conduct
content: Discipline is central to Daly College ethos. Students are guided to maintain punctuality, honesty, courtesy, and respect. The discipline system encourages responsibility, accountability, and self-control.
